package_description: A very large Torment-themed package emphasising black cards and graveyard/discard mechanics. Includes Madness, Threshold, Flashback, Swamp-matters, -X/-X and life-loss patterns, Cephalids, Zombies, punisher-style choices, and graveyard-as-resource effects. Designed to be mixed with your core pack or used alone.
